body_html: @zou3519 How about the status now ? e.g. IBM has provided a tutorial to compile PyTorch on Power architecture from source. How about writing a bash script for it and perhaps an overnight cron job and add this support to conda/pip installations ?
body_text: @zou3519  How about the status now ? e.g. IBM has provided a tutorial to compile PyTorch on Power architecture from source.  How about writing a bash script for it and perhaps an overnight cron job and add this support to conda/pip installations ?
body: @zou3519  How about the status now ? e.g. IBM has provided a [tutorial](https://ibmcode-staging.us-east.containers.mybluemix.net/tutorials/install-pytorch-on-power/) to compile PyTorch on Power architecture from source.  How about writing a bash script for it and perhaps an overnight cron job and add this support to conda/pip installations ?
